## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G46970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G46970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPHS2, PHS2</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana alpha-glucan phosphorylase 2, alpha-glucan phosphorylase 2
- **Description:**   alpha-glucan phosphorylase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2075576
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS169185]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Apart from a slight increase in rosette leaf size, no visible phenotype was observed.
